name: Naked Hero
description:
Story:


Naked Hero is adult themed RPG/adventure game. Game is adult content game where main character is only good woman who is living. She has only sword and health potions and mission is to find his captured husband in different levels. Totally 8 different themed levels. There is 4 different enemies. Robot with weapons, small orc with sword, big robot with dual swords and flying woman gnome who can throw balls against player. So beware there enemis, kill them or avoid them by sneaking and find your captured husband who is hidden somewhere in different maps. Game is RPG game with searching element


GAME HAS ADULT/SEXUAL CONTENT!

Features:

- 8 levels
- 4 different enemies: Robot with weapon, orc with sword, big robot and flying gnome
- Adult content theme, like main character is naked woman
